name: RTCSessionDescription.toJSON
description: The RTCSessionDescription.toJSON() method generates a JSON description of the object. Both properties, type and sdp, are contained in the generated JSON.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The RTCSessionDescription.toJSON() method generates a JSON description of the object. Both properties, type and sdp, are contained in the generated JSON.
